question: If a woman bleeds(menstruation) for 1 or 2 hours and then the blood stops for about 8 or 9 or 10 days.I haven ot said my salats in this time period.
answer:
QUESTION
If a woman bleeds(menstruation) for 1 or 2 hours and then the blood stops for about 8 or 9 or 10 days.I haven ot said my salats in this time period. Then starts again on the 10 th day .Should i say my salats in between.Because i have left most of them.Is this haidth or istehaza?
ANSWER


Share:

The entire period between the two bleedings will also be Haydh and no Salaat must be performed. (Haashiya al-Shibliy on Tabyeen al-Haqaaiq vol.1 pg.171; Beirut)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
